# negativeInfinity

**Type Property**

A value that represents negative infinity.

## Declaration

```swift
static let negativeInfinity: CMTime
```

## Discussion

Don’t test a time against this constant using (time == [doc://com.apple.coremedia/documentation/CoreMedia/CMTime/negativeInfinity]) because there are many times that are also negative infinity. Use [doc://com.apple.coremedia/documentation/CoreMedia/CMTIME_IS_NEGATIVEINFINITY(_:)] instead.

## Constants

- **zero**: A value that represents time zero.
- **invalid**: A value that represents an invalid time.
- **indefinite**: A value that represents an indefinite time.
- **positiveInfinity**: A value that represents positive infinity.
